articles.author: Adriana Hamacher
articles.description: DeFi trading terminal DexGuru is taking a novel community-first approach to launching its Decentralized Autonomous Organisation.
articles.title: DexGuru Hands Power to its Users With ‘Bootstrap’ DAO Launch

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The global toy company is partnering with OnChain Studios to bring its "iconic IP" to the metaverse.
articles.title: Mattel to Release ‘Cryptoys’ NFTs on Flow Blockchain

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The CEO and founder of Terraform Labs Do Kwon has been ordered to comply with subpoenas issued by the SEC in February.
articles.title: Do Kwon Appeal Overruled, Must Comply With SEC Investigation Into Mirror Protocol

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Charging Bitcoin miners the highest rate wasn't enough. Chelan County has now implemented a new crypto rate that's 29% higher.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miners Will See 29% Rate Hike on Hydroelectric Power in Washington

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Ledger's base-model hardware wallet gets a long-overdue update, adding a bigger screen and increased storage capacity.
articles.title: Ledger Nano S Plus Review: A Top Hardware Wallet Refreshed for 2022

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: Former Robinhood Crypto COO Christine Brown is among the three co-founders of Floor, a new NFT portfolio app with its own member NFTs.
articles.title: Former Robinhood, Button, Venmo Execs Raise $8M for NFT Company Floor

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The report cites concerns about the network's crash-prone node architecture. But Solana Labs has already refuted many of the claims.
articles.title: Solana Challenges Poor Safety Rating From DeFi Watchdog

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: The new Bitcoin Academy will offer classes, including "What is Cryptocurrency," to members of the Marcy Houses community where Jay-Z grew up.
articles.title: Jay-Z and Jack Dorsey Launch 'Bitcoin Academy' at Rapper's Childhood Home in Brooklyn

articles.author: Daniel Phillips,Stephen Graves
articles.description: Hardware wallets are the safest way to store your cryptocurrencies securely. But which is the best option? We review the leading devices.
articles.title: Best Crypto Wallet: The Top 8 Hardware Wallets

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The price of XTZ was quick to react to the news of USDT launching on the Tezos blockchain, soaring by 9% earlier in the day.
articles.title: Tezos Hits Four-Week High Following USDT Launch

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Pitched as a venture capital firm for the “creative class,” Felix Capital raised fresh funding with a focus on Web3 and crypto investments.
articles.title: Felix Capital Raises $600 Million to Boost Web3 Exposure

articles.author: MoreReese
articles.description: Proposed by Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin, Soulbound Tokens are non-transferable, non-financialized tokens for a Decentralized Society.
articles.title: What are Soulbound Tokens? Building Blocks for a Web3 Decentralized Society

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The New York State Department of Financial Services became America’s first regulator to issue regulatory guidance for dollar-backed stablecoins.
articles.title: New York Finance Regulator Issues Fresh Guidance on Dollar-Backed Stablecoins

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Tether’s USDT, the world’s largest stablecoin by market capitalization, is now available on the Tezos proof-of-stake blockchain.
articles.title: Tether Launches Stablecoin on Tezos to Unlock New DeFi Products

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: In a hotly-contested round of voting, the ApeCoin community has voted to stay on Ethereum. But not everyone’s happy.
articles.title: Divided ApeCoin Community Narrowly Approves Proposal to Stay on Ethereum

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The anonymous thief has sold off one million of the tokens as launch partner Wintermute tries to coax the hacker into cooperating.
articles.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Solution Optimism Loses 20 Million Tokens in Interlayer Snafu

articles.description: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”
articles.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Oscar-winning actor starred in "Zero Contact," a film released via NFTs last year. Now he's looking to buy his first NFT.
articles.title: Anthony Hopkins Adopts Ethereum Name, Asks Snoop Dogg What NFT to Buy

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: Stepn lets users earn crypto for exercising—giving them real returns for walking, jogging or running. But gameplay is complicated.
articles.title: What Is Stepn? The ‘Move-to-Earn’ NFT App That Pays You Crypto to Exercise

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The North Carolina congressman also has been accused of a pump-and-dump scheme tied to the “Let’s Go Brandon” coin.
articles.title: Madison Cawthorn Failed to Properly Disclose up to $950K in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana Trades

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Two major exchanges in South Korea said they will delist Litecoin due to new privacy features enabled by the protocol.
articles.title: Crypto Exchanges Delist Litecoin Over Privacy Feature Concerns

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The cloud software giant is expecting the new platform, launching now with a pilot program, to be widely available by October.
articles.title: Salesforce Launching Platform for Brands to Mint and Sell NFTs

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Blockchain needs an operating system, to provide a visual metaphor that everyone can understand and operate, argues Peer CEO Tony Tran.
articles.title: Before Building the Metaverse, Blockchain Needs an Operating System

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: In a historic move, Ethereum's longest-running testnet called Ropsten is transitioning to a proof-of-stake algorithm on Wednesday.
articles.title: Ethereum’s Merge Upgrade Goes Live Today on Ropsten Testnet

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The industry’s fourth-largest stablecoin is coming to Cosmos following a collaboration between cross-chain protocol Umee and the Maker team.
articles.title: Maker's Decentralized Stablecoin Is Coming to Cosmos Thanks to Umee

articles.description: Wallet provider aims to empower the unbanked within the Bitcoin payment industry.
articles.title: Edge Announces ‘Confidential’ Bitcoin Mastercard—But Mastercard Denies Involvement

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The new report suggests that the NFT market could decouple from financial markets in the same way art has split from the S&P 500.
articles.title: NFTs, Crypto Gaming Still Resilient After May Market Turbulence: DappRadar

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Rebecca Lamis believes negative narratives around NFTs can be quashed with education and in-person connection at places like the Quantum space in LA.
articles.title: How to Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder

articles.author: Joseph O'Neill
articles.description: Utility NFTs are more than just digital collectibles, affording holders privileges, rights and rewards that they wouldn’t otherwise be able to access.
articles.title: What Are Utility NFTs? Unique Tokens Offering Real-World Benefits

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Osmosis, a decentralized exchange built on Cosmos, was hacked for roughly $5 million, forcing developers to halt the network.
articles.title: Cosmos-based DeFi Exchange Osmosis Hit by $5M Exploit

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The price of  theLINK token soared to a four-week high following Chainlink's announcement of the staking launch in the second half of 2022.
articles.title: Chainlink Hits Four-Week High Following Updated Staking Roadmap Release

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The suit centers on the Fed’s 19-month delay in reviewing the crypto bank’s application, for a process that typically takes up to a week.
articles.title: Caitlin Long's Crypto Bank Custodia Sues Fed Over 'Master Account' Delays

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The “Always Sunny” star will co-create characters and stories and share in the royalties and revenue with NFT holders.
articles.title: 'Always Sunny' Actor Rob McElhenney Launches Web3 Writers Room With Ethereum NFTs

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The current top staking option offers APY as high as 18%.
articles.title: Binance US Launches High-Yield Crypto Staking for Solana, Avalanche and More

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The beer brand’s iconic horses will zip through digital races via NFTs, with competitions and other perks ahead for owners.
articles.title: Budweiser’s Clydesdales Zoom Into Ethereum NFT Racing Game Zed Run

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The company was widely criticized after pulling job offers that it promised not to.
articles.title: Coinbase Launches Database for People Whose Job Offers It Rescinded

articles.description: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.
articles.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: A report sent to Joe Biden by the attorney general comes in response to the president’s executive order.
articles.title: DOJ Recommends International Cooperation in Chasing Down Crypto Criminals

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: PayPal is finally offering a long-demanded feature that will let users move their crypto to external wallets and hardware devices.
articles.title: PayPal Lets Users Transfer Bitcoin and Ethereum to External Wallets

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Polygon USDC will be integrated to enable automatic payouts “in seconds.”
articles.title: Circle Adding USDC to Polygon for Web3 Payments

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Invest in the future of the metaverse with this new index, which amasses up to 40 relevant crypto assets.
articles.title: Metaverse Crypto Index Fund Launched by Matthew Ball, Multicoin, and Bitwise

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie sat down with Decrypt to discuss Calaxy raising $26 million and appointing a new CEO as it prepares to come out of beta.
articles.title: NBA Player Spencer Dinwiddie’s Crypto App Calaxy Raises $26M

articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.
articles.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy

articles.description: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.
articles.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis

articles.description: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.
articles.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA

articles.description: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next

articles.description: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.
articles.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project

articles.description: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.
articles.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs

articles.description: Episode 10 of the gm podcast: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.
articles.title: gm: DraftKings Goes Crypto

articles.description: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?

articles.description: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.
articles.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse

articles.description: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
